DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ABT-333 healthy volunteer antiviral activity HCV infect subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study ABT-333 Both Healthy Volunteers Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) + Genotype 1 Infected Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 1 , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled clinical trial healthy HCV genotype 1 infected adult evaluate safety , tolerability , antiviral activity pharmacokinetics ABT-333 .
DOC.criteria: Main Selection Criteria Healthy Volunteers : Subject provide write consent . Subject general good health . If female , subject postmenopausal . If female , subject pregnant breastfeeding . Main Selection Criteria HCV+ Subjects : Subject HAVIgM , HBsAg HIV Ab negative . Subject HCV genotype 1 HCV RNA > 50,000 IU/mL . Subject exclude previously receive antiviral therapy HCV infection Subjects must demonstrate chronic hepatitis C infection least 6 month prior study enrollment Subjects must prior liver biopsy histology consistent HCV induce liver damage , evidence cirrhosis liver pathology due cause chronic HCV . See main selection criterion
